name: Game In A Day - Cyber Climber
name_original: Game In A Day - Cyber Climber
description:
Game in a day game jam challenge and a portfolio addition. 

I wanted to make an icy tower based game where you can climb with a moving camera that gets faster the longer you climb. 

A/D or arrow keys for movement. Spacebar for jump and double jump

Press Escape whenever if you want to quit
